mapper.insert: insert into topic values( #{topic_no}, #{topic_name}, #{topic_confidential}, #{topic_explain}, 'null', null, null )
mapper.select: SELECT count(topic_name) FROM topic T INNER JOIN( select topic_no, team_no, count(*) as countof from topic_member group by topic_no, team_no having count(*)>1 )TM ON T.topic_no = TM.topic_no where T.topic_name=#{topic_name}
